text: ame musane kitaba api ane temana pachi bija payagambaro avatarita karya ane ame marayamana dikara isane prakasita purava apya, ane ruhul kudusa (jibra'ila a.Sa.) Vade temani madada karavi, parantu jyare pana tamari pase payagambara te vastu lavya je tamara svabhavathi virudhdha hati, tame jhadapathi ghamanda karyu, basa ketalakane to juthalavi didha ane ketalakane katla pana kari didha
